title: Arcane Basics
description: Test your knowledge of the hit Netflix animated series!

questions.question: What is the name of the underground city beneath Piltover?
questions.explanation: Zaun is the undercity that exists beneath the wealthy city of Piltover, separated by a massive bridge and stark class divide.

questions.question: Arcane is based on the video game League of Legends.
questions.explanation: Arcane is an animated series created by Riot Games based on their popular game League of Legends, focusing on the origins of champions Vi and Jinx.

questions.question: What is the name of the revolutionary substance that powers Hextech?
questions.explanation: Hex Crystals are magical gemstones from the mines that Jayce and Viktor use to create Hextech technology.

questions.question: What is the name of the bar that Vander runs in the Undercity?
questions.explanation: The Last Drop is Vander's bar in the Undercity where the community gathers and where he raises Vi, Powder, and others.

questions.question: Piltover is also known as the 'City of Progress'.
questions.explanation: Piltover is called the City of Progress due to its advanced technology, wealth, and the inventions coming from its prestigious academy.

questions.question: What event kicks off the main conflict in episode 1?
questions.explanation: The series begins with Vi, Powder, Mylo, and Claggor raiding Jayce's apartment, which leads to a catastrophic explosion.

questions.question: How many acts/parts does Arcane Season 1 have?
questions.explanation: Arcane Season 1 is divided into 3 acts, with 3 episodes each, totaling 9 episodes that were released over 3 weeks.

questions.question: The animation studio Fortiche produced Arcane.
questions.explanation: Fortiche Production, a French animation studio, created Arcane's unique visual style, blending 3D animation with 2D painting techniques.
